general.address: AFI FEST American Film Institute 2021 N. Western Ave. Los Angeles, CA 90027 USA

featureFilm.address: AFI FEST American Film Institute 2021 N. Western Ave. Los Angeles, CA 90027 USA

shortFilm.address: AFI FEST American Film Institute 2021 N. Western Ave. Los Angeles, CA 90027 USA

eligibilityCriteria.criteria: Feature films are considered those 41 minutes or longer. All films must have been completed on or after October 1, 2023.
Short films are considered those under 40 minutes. Priority will be given to films that have not screened previously in the region.
The submission fee is non-refundable. Rough cuts and works-in-progress are eligible if submitted prior to the final deadline.

fees.feeDetails: $40 Early Deadline, $50 Official Deadline, $60 Final Deadline
$70 Early Deadline, $85 Official Deadline, $100 Final Deadline

festivalInfo.description: AFI Fest is an annual film festival organized by the American Film Institute, held in Los Angeles, California. It showcases a diverse selection of international and American films, including feature films, documentaries, and short films. The festival emphasizes the celebration of storytelling through cinema and provides a platform for emerging filmmakers and industry professionals.
festivalInfo.name: AFI Fest

shortFilm.criteria: Short films are those under 40 minutes in length and must have been completed after October 1, 2023.

featureFilm.conditions: Feature films must be at least 41 minutes in length and completed after October 1, 2023.

testimonials.content: Great festival! The screening quality was spot on.
I'm still reeling that my film got into AFI Fest, let alone won an award! Thank you AFI Fest!
